findings.title: Incorrect versions of Solidity
findings.description: Using pragma solidity ^0.8.0; is too open and does not specify the exact version of the compiler.

findings.title: Public functions that could be declared external
findings.description: public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared external.

findings.title: State variables that could be declared immutable
findings.description: Constant state variables that are initialized in the constructor should be declared immutable to save gas.
